revision.text:
__FORCETOC__ '''Events''' are limited-time durations in which players are given the chance to capture unique Pokémon. Events usually occur in conjunction with real-world holidays (e.g. Halloween, Christmas), or coincide with the anniversary of important events in the Pokémon franchise (e.g. release of the first movie, release of ''Pokémon GO''). In most cases, the special Pokémon are added to region [[Roaming Pokémon|roamer]] pools. === List of Events === {| class="wikitable" |- ! Event !! Unlock Time !! Event Pokémon !! Other Pokémon !! Where to find event Pokémon |- | Flying Pikachu || July 6 - 12 || [[File:Flying Pikachu.png|50px]] Flying Pikachu || - || Added as roaming in [[Kanto]] |- | Armored Mewtwo || July 18 - 24 || [[File:Armored Mewtwo.png|50px]]Armored Mewtwo
[[File:Bulbasaur (Clone).png|50px]]Bulbasaur (Clone)
[[File:Charmander (Clone).png|50px]]Charmander (Clone)
[[File:Squirtle (Clone).png|50px]]Squirtle (Clone) || - || Armored Mewtwo added as rare spawn in [[Cerulean Cave]]
Clone Pokemon added as roaming pokemon in [[Kanto]] |- | Halloween || Oct 30 - Nov 5 || [[File:Spooky Bulbasaur.png|50px]]Spooky Bulbasaur
[[File:Spooky Togepi.png|70px]]Spooky Togepi
[[File:Pikachu(Gengar).png|50px]]Pikachu (Gengar) || Non-unique Ghost Pokémon appear as well
(Gastly, Misdreavus, Shuppet, Duskull)|| Added to route Pokémon pools,
one per region for [[Kanto]], [[Johto]], and [[Hoenn]] |- | Lets GO! || Dec 14 - 21 || [[File:Lets_Go_Eevee.1.png|50px]]Lets go Eevee
[[File:Lets Go Pikachu.1.png|50px]]Lets go Pikachu || - || Added as Roaming pokemon in [[Kanto]] |- | Christmas || Dec 24 - 30 || [[File:Santa_Snorlax.png|50px]]Santa Snorlax || - || Added as roaming pokemon in all [[Regions]] |} === Suggestions for New Events === We are always looking for new ideas for events to be implemented in the future. Suggestions can be submitted on the [https://discord.gg/a6DFe4p Pokeclicker Discord]. [[Category:Unique Pokémon]]
revision.comment: Page formatting, other ghost mons for Halloween
